title: FS: WaJo Port (PSA 4) and Hands At Chest (PSA 3)
author: mechanicalman

posts.post_title: FS: WaJo Port (PSA 4) and Hands At Chest (PSA 3)
posts.post_content:
2 Johnsons for sale. 

The PSA 4 Portrait is bright and well centered. But it has some spider wrinkling above his head. I honestly believe this might be a bit overgraded. Maybe a 3 or 3.5, but a nice one at that. Not a PWCC purchase. Price: $3000. 


The 3 is bright and well focused. Appears to be a small surface wrinkle on the back of his head. It's a Sweet Cap 350-460/42 OP, which is a bit rarer than other Sweet Caps if you care about that sort of thing. Not a PWCC purchase. Price: $1300

Prices are firm at this point. I'll update if I decide to lower, but will probably take to the National for trade bait/consignment if no interest. 

Please email [url]samuelswartz@yahoo.com[/url] for fastest communication.
